name: Amy's Greenmart
description:
Diving into the story of Amy’s Greenmart, you are to open the network of eco-friendly shops! Improve your time management skills in successful management of your own business: hire helpers, look after the garden, catch troublemakers, keep the shop clean and get rewards. Amy’s Greenmart is a time management game that gives you a chance to feel the atmosphere of eco-friendly shops network. Become a part of the story of Amy and Napoleon The Cat. Go all the way to the final together with Amy in the Collector’s Edition of the game. Three additional locations with new plants and products help you to enjoy the best game moments and learn the whole story of Amy.
- Full story is available
- 3 additional locations
- More new products, devices and plants
- Create a network of eco-friendly shops
- Hire helpers
- Improve your management skills
